title: Companion Approval Guide
content: ale +Karlach +Wyll + Astarion - Barcus Wroot Blighted Village - Windmill Area, follow the sound of a screaming Deep Gnome. From the main entrance of the Village coming from the Druid Grove. Simply follow the main road until you see the Windmill. Convince the ogres to side with you Requirements/Details: First you have to win the Deceit Roll to be able to open the possibility of hiring them Win any of the skill roles needed to hire the Ogres. Karlach + Shadowheart+ None Lump the Enlightened Blight
